common.description: LaborLooker connects homeowners with vetted, highly-rated local contractors for all home improvement needs. Get instant quotes, read verified reviews, and book services with confidence.

googlePlayStore.title: LaborLooker - Local Contractors
googlePlayStore.shortDescription: Find trusted local contractors instantly with verified reviews and instant quotes
googlePlayStore.fullDescription:
Transform your home improvement experience with LaborLooker - the premier platform connecting homeowners with verified, highly-rated local contractors.

üîç FIND THE RIGHT CONTRACTOR
‚Ä¢ Browse thousands of vetted professionals in your area
‚Ä¢ Filter by specialty, rating, and availability
‚Ä¢ View detailed profiles with verified credentials
‚Ä¢ Get instant availability and pricing estimates

‚≠ê TRUSTED REVIEWS & RATINGS
‚Ä¢ Read authentic reviews from verified customers
‚Ä¢ See photo galleries of completed projects
‚Ä¢ Access detailed contractor histories and certifications
‚Ä¢ Make informed decisions with transparent feedback

üí¨ SEAMLESS COMMUNICATION
‚Ä¢ Message contractors directly through the app

Download now and discover why thousands of homeowners trust LaborLooker for their home improvement needs!
googlePlayStore.releaseNotes: Initial release with core contractor search, ratings, and messaging features
